title: vidurana bhAgyavidu
sahitya:
vidurana bhAgyavidu I padumajANDa taletogutalidakO


caraNam 1    gururAyanu khaLananujanu ravijanu guru gAngEyaru nODutire 
harisi rathava naDEsuta hari bIdili barutire janarige sOjigavenisuta
    caraNam 2    hrdayadoLage nele goNDiha hariyanu edurali kANuta viduranu tA 
sadanava nUkukulatA kSaNa bItige madadindali kuNidADuta bandanu
    caraNam 3    dUradaliha shrIshana nODuta bahu hAruta cIruta mai maredu 
vAridhAreyanu nEtradi surisuta bAri bAri balu higguva manadali
    caraNam 4    aDigaDige tanu keDavutalELuta drDha bhakutiyali gadgada svaradim 
nuDigaLu todaluta rOma puLakitadi duDu duDu ODADuva dasha disheyali
    caraNam 5    hADuva hAruva cIruvudellanu nODi nagutalire mAdhavanu 
nIDuta karava piDidu bigidappi koNDADuta bahaLa yamAmshananu
    caraNam 6    ollanu kujanara sEveyemba nuDi sallisuvudakA samayadali 
malla vidUranA kutsita kukSaradalli bandu kuLitanu idE sAkSiyu
    caraNam 7    shrInivAsa mantiradoLu baralAnandAbdhiyoLIsutale 
Enembenu sukrtavEnodagido tAne banda bahu vicitravenutali
    caraNam 8    gangOdakadali padyugmava toLedangake pUsi su-gandhavanu 
mangaLakara puSpangaLa samarpisi kangaLa thaNithaNi nODuta mUrtiya
    caraNam 9    vAridhi maneyAdakhilEshake gOkSIra svalpa koDalAdaradi 
vArijAkSa kara sampuTadi kuDidu nIrandadi harisida bIdiyoLage
  caraNam 10    ondu kuDute pAlige haLLAyitu mandaradharana mahAtmeyanu 
indiregasadaLa cittisalendigu mandanu ballane endu pogaLutiha
  caraNam 11    surarAkAshadi neredu nODi balu haruSadi vidUrana pogaLuvaru 
siri dEviyarasa purandara viTTalana sharaNare dhanyaru dhanyaru dhareyoLu
